Name: A Zone
About the game: A Zone is a leisure game of black and white painting style This is a horizontal and oblique elimination type game Cooperate to find the elements of the game At the same time, you get 100 points each time Unlock a stubble game I'm a depressed person. The pressure of working and living every day makes me gasp for breath. But I really want to be happy. I also like making games. My abilities are limited. One day scribbled on paper about what I wanted to do. A sudden idea flashed through my mind. I want to bring you a simple and discovery-based game. I hope this graffiti-type game can bring happiness to everyone. If you are tired, let go of your boredom. Maybe this little game won't bring you anything. But I want world peace. I hope you can support my creation. I really hope I can continue to make all kinds of games for you.~ I love you! I hope everyone can be happy! At least not as depressed as I am. I want people who love me, too. I also want to experience the feeling of being loved.
